title: SEE!
author: VD
content_html:
“Or Sisyphus, where you two are concerned.”

JAU*Scratches head, pulls out book on mythology, reads for 20 min, snorts coffee out nose.*

See, Space Bunny, someone DOES appreciate my sense of humor. Sometimes it just takes a while to grok its fullness. (This is a long-running debate between the two of us. She is of the opinion that no one on the planet* shares my sense of humor; I argue that I’m simply misunderstood by patriarchal Western culture and will eventually be lionized as a great humorist and philosopher in some as yet undiscovered society, not unlike Jerry Lewis in France.)

*We both agree JamieR doesn’t count, he’s obviously insane. Or drunk. And Australian to boot, though I suppose that’s redundant.
content_text:
“Or Sisyphus, where you two are concerned.”
JAU*Scratches head, pulls out book on mythology, reads for 20 min, snorts coffee out nose.*
See, Space Bunny, someone DOES appreciate my sense of humor.  Sometimes it just takes a while to grok its fullness.  (This is a long-running debate between the two of us.  She is of the opinion that no one on the planet* shares my sense of humor; I argue that I’m simply misunderstood by patriarchal Western culture and will eventually be lionized as a great humorist and philosopher in some as yet undiscovered society, not unlike Jerry Lewis in France.)
*
We both agree JamieR doesn’t count, he’s obviously insane.  Or drunk.  And Australian to boot, though I suppose that’s redundant.
